doc.title: Dans les fers
doc.plot: Member of a totalitarian society, an old writer creates his personal rebellion in writing a story about freedom. It is the story of a series of encounters. The first one takes place when an imaginary hero arrives to an imaginary totalitarian society, where he meets a young girl that is imprisoned. The second encounter happens when both characters escape and they arrive to a medieval town, and they realize that there is no real difference between this far away place and the society they escaped from. Finally, they arrive to a place separated from the rest of the world, in which the last encounter -the most frightening one- takes place: the encounter with themselves.
